name: 🐾 Zoey in the Laundry – High Top Canvas Shoes
description:
$65.00 | Limited Release
Category: Statement Sneakers • Artist Series • Collector-Edition Footwear


🎨 Designed with Heart
Bring art to your feet with these bold, high-top canvas shoes—part of the Zoey in the Laundry collection, a playful Warhol-style series celebrating Jen Long’s beloved pup and muse, Zoey. Every pair is infused with personal flair, crafted by Jen and her small creative team. This isn’t fast fashion—it’s meaningful, wearable art.
From the vivid pop-art panels to Zoey’s wide-eyed charm peeking through the folds of striped laundry, these shoes deliver whimsy, warmth, and serious wow factor. Handmade for comfort and style, they’re built to spark joy with every step.


🧵 Product Details
100% polyester canvas upper
Ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) rubber outsole
Breathable lining, soft insole
Faux leather toe cap
Padded collar, lace-up front
Soles and laces in matching colors
Printed with original artwork by Jen Long
Sourced & produced with care; blank product base sourced from China


🌍 Shipping Availability
Ships to: US, Canada, UK, Australia, New Zealand, Japan, and most of Europe (see full list in checkout).


📦 Some units may ship internationally if local stock runs low. You’ll always be kept in the loop.


✨ Welcome to Stress-Free Shopping


🛍️ More Than a Store—It’s a Service
Think of this as Costco meets concierge. Every item is handpicked, thoughtfully designed, and backed with personal attention.


✅ Returns? No Hassle
Even if a supplier says “final sale,” I’ll take it back. Message me—I'll make it right.


📦 Shipping With a Human Touch
I ship from U.S. warehouses whenever possible. Need special delivery? I offer freight forwarding and can accommodate APO/FPO or remote addresses. Just ask.


💡 Why These Cost More Than Amazon
Because you’re not just buying shoes. You’re buying peace of mind, small-batch curation, and an actual person who gives a damn.


🔁 Suggested Uses & Styling Ideas:
Pair with solid joggers or denim to let the pattern pop
Great for collectors of pet-inspired or pop-art fashion
Makes a heartfelt gift for dog lovers or art enthusiasts
